name: 3rd International Conference on Materials Science & Nanotechnology
content: Future Materials 2022 is scheduled to take place in Rome, Italy from Oct 3-Oct 05, 2022, and it will provide an international platform for the dissemination of advancement in the research and development of Future Materials. The agenda will be focused on â€œRecent Advancement in Materials Engineering and its Commercial Perspective". Future Materials 2022 will feature talks on new materials and research directions, nanotechnology-driven solutions in materials engineering, commercialization- opportunities and challenges, and other important interdisciplinary topics. The previous two editions of the Future Materials meeting were attended by experts from both industry and academia, including the noble laureates and C-level executives. The committee invites researchers and industry professionals working on various aspects of Materials Science and Nanotechnology to participate and contribute to the advancement of materials research and development. Scientific Sessions of Future Materials Conference 2022: Future Materials: Characterization, Theory and Design; Future Materials for Energy and Sustainability; Bio and Soft Materials: Biomedical, Medicine and Other Applications; Structural and Functional Materials; Materials for Electronics, Optics, and Photonics; Nanomaterials For more conference details, kindly visit: https://materialsconference.yuktan.com/
